channel.title: how far is black mesa
channel.description: hi there i am new to black mesa and half-life and i want to know how much of the story is included and what is missing or if its complete because i havent really played the original hl(i got to a few parts after you receive the shotgun) and i would rather play the black mesa version so yeah if you could just tell me whats covered already and if anything wont be covered

item.title: how far is black mesa
item.dc:creator: Leck
item.description:
I also wanted the entire game in the mod. Think it this way, if you cut those parts that are unpopular those parts that are good but not the best will become unpopular, (also those parts that are the best will become the best of the best) So i think to have a balanced game it must have ups and downs. Just my opinion

item.title: how far is black mesa
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
0_22one:

No one did. I didn’t miss the cut stuff in Surface Tension either. They’re great, but they woulda bogged BMS down for sure.

It bothered me because it messed up the flow of the story. In HL1, the military felt like they were gradually getting beat back as you progressed. In BM, they’re in near-complete control one minute, and the next pulling out for no clear reason.

item.title: how far is black mesa
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
dky.tehkingd.u:

I don’t miss the OaR stuff, but the Surface Tension cut was very jarring.

Funnily enough, it’s the opposite for me. While BM did a good job of cutting them away seamlessly, and I loved ST in the original, I missed the scenes in OAR more. It has a reputation for being the most dull and least loved chapter, but for all that I love it. Might have something to do with it being the chapter on screen the first time I laid eyes on the game, though.
